welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kasumigaura, the charming city known for its tranquil lake and picturesque landscapes. We're excited to have you here and invite you to explore and experience all that our beautiful city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ibaraki Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ibaraki Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Narita International Airport, serving primarily international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Narita International Airport, serving primarily domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Narita International Airport, serving low-cost carriers and international flights.

wifi.note: High-speed internet access is available throughout the airport.
